hello: just use synaptic and install xubuntu-desktop
xubuntu-desktop doesnt exist on hoary, install xfce4 things instead
apt-cache search xfce4 to find all the pkgs you need to install
xubuntu-desktop only exists in breezy, yes
but you can install the same pkgs on hoary
i will say it again. "apt-cache search xfce4"  use the results from the search to put into "sudo apt-get install pkg1 pkg2" etc
